data.englishTranslation: When you sneeze, then say: 'All praises and thanks are to Allah.' (1) Your companion should say: 'May Allah have mercy upon you.' (2) Then you should reply: 'May Allah guide you and set your affairs in order.' (3)
data.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaah. (1) Yarhamukallaah. (2) Yahdeekumul-laahu wa yuslihu baalakum. (3)
data.arabicVerse: (1) الْحَمْدُ للَّهِ (2) يَرْحَمُكَ اللَّهُ (3) يَهْدِيكُمُ اللَّهُ وَيُصْلِحُ بَالَكُم
